function NPC_104001:Init( NPCID ) NPC_104003.TIMER_ID = 1 NPC_104003.TIMER_TIME = 60 * 2 end
function NPC_104003:OnSpawn( Info ) -- GLog("NPC_104003:OnSpawn()\n") this:SetTimer( NPC_104003.TIMER_ID, NPC_104003.TIMER_TIME, false ) end
function NPC_104003:OnTimer( Index ) -- GLog("NPC_104003:OnTimer() "..Index.."\n") if Index == NPC_104003.TIMER_ID then this:Despawn(false) end end
